title: Cavaria con Premezzo
data: Cavaria con Premezzo is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Varese in the Italian region Lombardy, located about 40 kilometres (25 mi) northwest of Milan and about 13 kilometres (8 mi) south of Varese. Cavaria con Premezzo borders the following municipalities: Besnate, Cassano Magnago, Gallarate, Jerago con Orago, Oggiona con Santo Stefano. It is served by Cavaria-Oggiona-Jerago railway station. This article on a location in the Province of Varese is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
